short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swap faces directly from your browser with InsightFace AI precision. Right-click any image and swap instantly!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Picsi.Ai Chrome Extension brings effortless face-swapping directly to your browser. Powered by the cutting-edge InsightFace Ai's state-of-the-art Inswapper technology, found nowhere else, it allows you to swap faces with unmatched precision—right from your favorite websites. Whether you’re exploring creative projects or having fun, this tool makes face-swapping simple, fast, and engaging.

Why Install the Picsi.Ai Chrome Extension?
1. Quick and Seamless Face Swaps: Right-click on most images across the web to swap faces instantly.
2. Wide Compatibility: Fully tested on platforms like MidJourney, Leonardo.ai, Facebook, Google Image Search, and X.com, with flexibility to try swapping on images from other websites too!
3. Easy Configuration: Upload and manage up to 4 source face images using the extension’s intuitive control panel.
4. Tailored Features: Enjoy essential free features or unlock advanced tools with a subscription for even greater possibilities.

How to Use the Extension
1. Log In with Discord: Authenticate using your Discord account to access the extension’s features.
2. Upload Source Images: Add up to 4 source face photos of yourself or those you have permission to use via the configuration panel.
3. Start Swapping: On supported websites or anywhere you see an image, right-click and select “Face Swap with Picsi.Ai” to swap your source face onto the image.
4. Target Selection for Advanced Users: Support right-clicking on the target face to select a specific person for face swapping.
5. Experiment Freely: While fully compatible with tested sites, the extension works on most images unless a website has locked out interactions. Feel free to try it on any image!
6. Download Your Creation: Save the swapped image locally with a simple right-click.
